Reviews.Content: stayed 19 dec 2011 till 22 dec 2011 hotel strangers guests reception usually angry didnt answered worst morning 415 am heard screaming woke ran girl lay scream help 5 6 min security thin couldnt quiet girl screaming terrible terrible terrible

Reviews.Title: “fantastic....too good to be true for such good money!”

Reviews.Title: “great hotel, quick service, lovely staff”
